intro: Huberia ovalifolia var. robusta, commonly known as the robust huberia, is a species of flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its robust growth habit and showy, tubular flowers. The plant typically features opposite, ovate leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Its flowers are usually violet or purple in color and are arranged in dense, spike-like inflorescences. It thrives in full sun to partial shade and requires well-drained soil for optimal growth.
